data.name: Moonshine Maniacs: Rusty Skins
data.detailed_description:
You like patina, rust, weathered metal and wood? Then this pack will satisfy your needs for Moonshine Maniacs. Time to show your enemies that a rusty gun is still deadly.

This pack contains rusty skins for all available weapons.
data.about_the_game:
You like patina, rust, weathered metal and wood? Then this pack will satisfy your needs for Moonshine Maniacs. Time to show your enemies that a rusty gun is still deadly.

This pack contains rusty skins for all available weapons.
